Metadata: Sea Urchin, Kelp, Abalone News (Number 1 and 2, March and September 1993)

Topics in Number 1: Conference publications; A research agenda for black abalone mortality in California; Sea grant abalone research projects; Red sea urchin life-history research at UC Davis; Demersal mollusc research group meeting, Australia; The 1994 International abalone symposium info; FAO manual on dive fisheries; and Prospects for a major sea urchin industry in New Zealand. Topics in Number 2: Related newsletters; Red sea urchin culture methods workshop info; Rotating spatial sea urchin harvest research in California; A study on the fishery and ecology of sea urchins in Baja California, Mexico; Maine weighs green urchin regulations; Abalone research in South Africa, and Abalone symposium info.
